name: intro
description:
Welcome to space station X5-Y.

You are a cebernetically enhanced clone of a 2000 year old millitairy engineer. 2 days ago we received no more updates from this spacestation. The nearest automated support station defrosted a fresh clone (you) and was send here. You have the following orders:

1. Investigate.
2. Restore communications.

This means in short: find the controlpanel in the command centre while finding out what happend to the crew.
